trans-unit.source: Represents a SOAP fault code.
trans-unit.target: 代表 SOAP 錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Fault code provides a machine-readable identifier that can be used to programmatically identify the error condition and respond as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼會提供機器可讀取的識別項，供您以程式設計方式識別錯誤狀況並適時回應。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP specifications define the following fault codes specific to SOAP 1.1 and 1.2.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 規格可定義下列 SOAP 1.1 與 1.2 專屬的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1。

trans-unit.source: `VersionMismatch`, `MustUnderstand`, `Client`, and `Server`.
trans-unit.target: `VersionMismatch`、`MustUnderstand`、`Client`和`Server`。

trans-unit.source: SOAP 1.2.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.2。

trans-unit.source: `VersionMismatch`, `MustUnderstand`, `DataEncodingUnknown`, `Sender`, and `Receiver`.
trans-unit.target: `VersionMismatch`、`MustUnderstand`、`DataEncodingUnknown`、`Sender` 和 `Receiver`。

trans-unit.source: In addition to those fault codes defined by the SOAP specifications, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] uses fault codes defined by each Web services specification that it implements.
trans-unit.target: 除了 SOAP 規格所定義的錯誤碼之外，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 會使用本身所實作之每個 Web 服務規格所定義的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤次要代碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> class with the specified name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱和命名空間，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode> object is used in conjunction with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault> object to fully represent a SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode> 物件與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault> 物件一起使用，可充分表示 SOAP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> or <paramref name="ns" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 或 <paramref name="ns" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> object that represents the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 代表錯誤次要代碼的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> class with the specified name, namespace, and fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、命名空間與錯誤子代碼，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> or <paramref name="ns" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 或 <paramref name="ns" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a receiver fault code for a message.
trans-unit.target: 建立訊息的接收者錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> object that represents the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 代表錯誤次要代碼的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a receiver fault code with the specified subcode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的次要代碼來建立接收者錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> object with the created SOAP fault subcode in the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" /> 屬性中建立的 SOAP 錯誤次要代碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subCode" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subCode" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The local name for the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤次要代碼的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace name for the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤次要代碼的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a receiver fault code with the specified subcode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的次要代碼來建立接收者錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> instance with the created SOAP fault subcode in the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 屬性中，包含建立的 SOAP 錯誤次要代碼的 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a sender fault code with the specified subcode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的次要代碼來建立寄件人錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> object that represents the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 代表錯誤次要代碼的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a sender fault code with the specified subcode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的次要代碼來建立寄件人錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> object with the created SOAP fault subcode in the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" /> 屬性中建立的 SOAP 錯誤次要代碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subCode" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subCode" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The local name for the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤次要代碼的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace name for the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤次要代碼的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a sender fault code with the specified subcode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的次要代碼來建立寄件人錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> object with the created SOAP fault subcode in <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" />，包含建立的 SOAP 錯誤次要代碼的 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode.SubCode" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the fault is a SOAP 1.1 or SOAP 1.2 fault.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出錯誤為 SOAP 1.1 或 SOAP 1.2 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the fault is a SOAP 1.1 or SOAP 1.2 fault; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果錯誤為 SOAP 1.1 或 SOAP 1.2 錯誤，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the fault is a SOAP 1.1 server fault or a SOAP 1.2 receiver fault.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出錯誤為 SOAP 1.1 伺服器錯誤或 SOAP 1.2 接收者錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the fault is a SOAP 1.1 server fault or a SOAP 1.2 receiver fault; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果錯誤為 SOAP 1.1 伺服器錯誤或 SOAP 1.2 接收者錯誤，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the fault is a SOAP 1.1 client fault or a SOAP 1.2 sender fault.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出錯誤為 SOAP 1.1 用戶端錯誤或 SOAP 1.2 寄件人錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the fault is a SOAP 1.1 client fault or a SOAP 1.2 sender fault; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果錯誤為 SOAP 1.1 用戶端錯誤或 SOAP 1.2 寄件人錯誤，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 取得錯誤碼的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤碼的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace for the fault code.
trans-unit.target: 取得錯誤碼的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the namespace name.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間名稱的統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 取得錯誤次要代碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> object that represents the fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: 代表錯誤次要代碼的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultCode" /> 物件。
